summary: Allows a character to become intoxicated and progressively drunk after consuming alcohol.  Adds radial blur, stumbling animations, double vision, and full motion screen blur. Duration is dependent on the type of alcohol consumed.  The effects are gradual based on the number of drinks.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add radial blur, distortion, stumbling, and other inebriation effects after consuming Nord Mead, Alto Wine, Spiced Wine, and many other alcoholic beverages.

[youtube]2eQYs47LV3I[/youtube]

Take a closer look at the mod here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y6ZCocqR98g
author: Jeremy Burkhart

files.name: get_drunk_v103
files.changelogHtml:
-Drunken effect is now dependant on the amount of alcohol consumed. Drinking a little will render a light buzz, while drinking heavily will get you completely sh!t faced. (And everything in the middle).
-Moified drunken state with progressive radial blur, double-vision, full-screen motion blur, and a longer delay in eye focus between distant and near objects.
-Drunken-stumbling in first and third person now becomes more frequent as you continue to drink.
